name: Nuria's Redemption
description:
THE ORIGINAL NURIA'S REDEMPTION!

Survive baby rounds in the Survival Mode, or save time in the TIME-OPS mode!

Survival mode

gigantic rounds of babies are coming to vanquish Nuria! You'll need to use your school items (Lead fillers... ejem...) to "Vanquish" your baby students!

TIME-OPS mode 

babies send you out of time! They will try to literally break time!  Set a time tower to restore time, and defend it from the babies!
